documentation.text:
@dev Set UTokens smart contract.
 Emits a {SetUTokensContract} event.
@dev checks if the address is Bech32 valid

@dev Withdraws `amount` tokens to the caller's address `to`.
 Emits a {WithdrawUTokens} event.
@dev Emitted when minimum values are set
@dev Emitted when contract addresses are set
@dev get fees, minimum set values and value divisor
@dev Emitted when uTokens are generated in batch

attributes.text:
@dev Set UTokens smart contract.
 Emits a {SetUTokensContract} event.
@dev checks if the address is Bech32 valid

@dev Withdraws `amount` tokens to the caller's address `to`.
 Emits a {WithdrawUTokens} event.
@dev Emitted when minimum values are set
@dev Emitted when contract addresses are set
@dev get fees, minimum set values and value divisor
@dev Emitted when uTokens are generated in batch

GenerateUTokensInBatch(address[],uint256.details: Emitted when uTokens are generated in batch

SetMinimumValues(uint256,uint256).details: Emitted when minimum values are set

SetUTokensContract(address).details: Emitted when contract addresses are set

generateUTokens(address,uint256).details: Mint new utokens for the provided 'address' and 'amount'

params.amount: : number of tokens Emits a {GenerateUTokens} event with 'to' set to address and 'amount' set to amount of tokens.

generateUTokensInBatch(address[],uint256.details: Mint new utokens for the provided 'address' and 'amount' in batch

params.amounts: : array of tokens Emits a {GenerateUTokensInBatch} event with 'to' set to address and 'amount' set to amount of tokens.
params.toAddresses: : array of account addresses, amount[]: array of tokens

getProps().details: get fees, minimum set values and value divisor

isBech32Valid(string).details: checks if the address is Bech32 valid

pause().details: Triggers stopped state. Requirements: - The contract must not be paused.

params.minWithdraw: : withdraw minimum value Emits a {SetMinimumValues} event with 'minimum value' set to withdraw.

setUTokensContract(address).details: Set UTokens smart contract. Emits a {SetUTokensContract} event.

unpause().details: Returns to normal state. Requirements: - The contract must be paused.

withdrawUTokens(address,uint256,string).details: Withdraws `amount` tokens to the caller's address `to`. Emits a {WithdrawUTokens} event.
